text: Takinoa Tekaei (born 12 August 1974), is a retired I-Kiribati footballer who played as a defender. ==International career== Tekaei represented Kiribati at the 2003 Pacific Games. ==Career statistics== === International === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center" |- !
